content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from november 22 2004 which involves multiple parties and discusses the division of assets in a building located in castelfidardo the assets include garages apartments and land the document states the income and revenue for each property the parties agree to end the coownership and allocate shares of the properties to each individual it also mentions the availability of title guarantee and the overall value of the common estate the document takes effect immediately and mentions the familys patrimonial regime the expenses of the document are to be shared equally by two of the parties all parties and the notary have signed the document
